Insert current date time while you are in 'insert mode'

\2023-\10-\14 \02:\40:\43

Now, when you are in insert mode, you can press Control + d to insert the current date and time in the specified format at the cursor position. Feel free to modify the key mapping () to your preference.

Add following to your .vimrc

function! InsertCurrentDateTime()
  let l:datetime = system('date "+\%Y-\%m-\%d \%H:\%M:\%S"')[:-2]
  return l:datetime
endfunction

inoremap <C-d> <C-r>=InsertCurrentDateTime()<CR>
2023-10-14 03:07:15
